entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: In a recent exchange on the Bitcoin Development Mailing List, Fabian expressed strong support for Jon Atack's involvement in a particular aspect of Bitcoin development. Highlighting Jon Atack's familiarity with the development process, his previous achievements in documentation, and his excellent command of English, Fabian's endorsement is clear. However, he also noted his unfamiliarity with the other candidates, limiting his recommendation solely to Jon Atack. This concise endorsement reflects not just personal preference but points towards Jon Atack's recognized capabilities within the community, emphasizing the value of expertise and communication skills in contributing to Bitcoin's development.
